result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Eric J Burrell Jr

records.addlTxt:
Defendants requested a substitution against Judge Crivello, Branch 36. 
Court consented to substitution against Judge Crivello.  
Parties are advised the Clerk of Circuit Court reassigned case pursuant to current court rules to JUDGE SHELTON, BRANCH 40.
Case re-assigned to General Felony Court.

Defendant Eric J Burrell Jr appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Matt Last appeared by video for Eric J Burrell Jr.  Attorney Jacob Daniel Corr appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in Court for Scheduling Conference. Court reviewed Defense Motion for Bail Reduction or Modification. Discussion placed on the record. Arguments heard regarding bail. For reasons stated on the record, Court DENIED Defense Motion for Bail Reduction of Modification. Defense advised the Court of Defendant's revocation hearing. Court addressed nature of the charges and case assignment. Based on the Felony Intake Schedule, case re-assigned to Judge Crivello, Branch 36. Case adjourned for Scheduling Conference, Branch 36.  **Defendant advised the Court of REQUEST FOR SUBSTITUTION.**

Next Court date: Scheduling Conference scheduled for December 9, 2022 at 08:30 am in Room 634 of the Courthouse. 
Hearing will be held before Judge Shelton, Branch 40. If Defendant remains in custody at CJF, he will be produced.
DEFENSE NOTICE OF MOTION AND MOTION FOR BAIL REDUCTION OR MODIFICATION; received, filed, and forwarded to the Judge for review.

Defendant Eric J Burrell Jr appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Matt Last appeared by video for Eric J Burrell Jr.  Prosecuting attorney Gregg Herman in court in person for the State of Wisconsin. 
Preliminary hearing proceeded. Court took judicial notice of case #18CF5237 and case #21CF2664.  Sworn for the State: MPD Officer A. Schnell. State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned to Branch 46.
Scheduling conference scheduled for October 20, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Eric J Burrell Jr not in court, in custody.  Attorney Matt Last appeared by video for Eric J Burrell Jr.  Abby Rockendorf in court, appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case set for a preliminary hearing. State witness was not able to appear due to stuck on service call. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 14, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Adjustment Number: 22A 080498,
Payable Number: 1027514,
Receipt Number: 22RP033827,
Amount: $20.00
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Eric J Burrell in court with attorney Maryann Corea.  Defendant Eric J Burrell in custody.  Jennifer L Pickett appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Eric J Burrell appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Feiss, Branch 46. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 26, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Eric J Burrell Jr
Current: 3869 N 62nd Street, Milwaukee, WI 53216   (Effective: 08-18-2022)
Prior: 4108 West Capital Drive, Milwaukee, WI 53216
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
